ygData.subject: Re: GuComics.com
ygData.msgSnippet: OK, where can we access the archived comics? Dagdason ... there was a ... discontinued as ... it was a ... now ... favorite ...
ygData.messageBody:
OK, where can we access the archived comics?

Dagdason

--- In EverQuest@y..., "Thomas H. Comegys" <comegys@p...> wrote:
>
> I visited EQ Traders Corner (www.eqtraders.com) yesterday, and
there was a
> message from the cartoonist saying that GU Comics had been
discontinued as
> of August 29. The archives were still available, though. I agree,
it was a
> great comic.
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Amanda" <ZeonChar@M...>
> To: <EverQuest@y...>
> Sent: Sunday, September 02, 2001 8:03 PM
> Subject: [EverQuest] GuComics.com
>
>
> > Hey, does anyone know what's up with the Everquest-based comic
> > GuComics.com? For a week or so now their page has been down and
now
> > it looks like the name isn't registered anymore. That was my
favorite
> > online comic next to Penny Arcade and I really want to know what
> > happened! Anyone?
> >
> >
> >
> > Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
> >
> >
> > Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to
http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
> >
> >
